ing: 1 (3 ounce) package orange flavored Jell-OÂ® mix
1 (3.4 ounce) package instant vanilla pudding mix
1 (3 ounce) package instant tapioca pudding mix
1 (8 ounce) tub frozen whipped topping, thawed
des: "Orange cream flavored gelatin salad with pineapple and mandarin oranges. A family favorite in the summer."
ins: Bring the water to a boil in a large saucepan. Whisk in the orange gelatin mix, vanilla pudding mix and tapioca pudding mix. Return to a boil and cook for 1 minute, stirring constantly. Remove from the heat and allow to cool completely. Fold in mandarin oranges, pineapple and whipped topping. Transfer to a serving bowl and refrigerate for at least 2 hours. Fluff the top using a spoon before serving.
